generated.css: html{font-size:62.5%}*{box-sizing:border-box}body{margin:0;padding:0;height:100vh;background:#0e3434;color:#fff5ee;font-size:16px;grid-template-rows:100px 1fr;font-family:Montserrat,sans-serif}body,main{display:grid}main{width:100%;margin:0 auto;height:100%;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr}section{padding:20px}section .section-title{font-style:italic;margin:0 0 15px;font-size:18px;letter-spacing:0;border-bottom:1px solid #fff5ee}@media (min-width:1150px){main{grid-template-columns:300px 1fr 1fr 300px}section{padding:20px}section .section-title{font-size:22px;letter-spacing:3px}}.menu{grid-column:3/5}.controls{margin-bottom:10px;padding:10px 0;border:1px solid #fff5ee;border-radius:15px;text-align:center}.controls h6{margin:0 0 10px;font-size:18px}.controls__button{height:35px;width:35px;margin:0 10px;border:1px solid #fff5ee;border-radius:10px;background:none;outline:none;font:inherit;color:#fff5ee;font-weight:700}.controls__button--add{background:#5f9ea0}.controls__button--remove{background:tomato}.controls__button--add:hover,.controls__button--remove:hover{cursor:pointer;background-color:#8fbbbd}.controls__button--remove:hover{background-color:#fa2600}@media (min-width:700px){.menu{grid-column:4/5}}@media (min-width:1150px){.controls{padding:10px 20px;margin-bottom:20px}.controls__button{height:45px;width:45px}}.stats{grid-column:1/3}.stats__container{background-color:#2f5a5a;border-radius:15px;width:80%;padding:10px}.stats-item{padding:10px 0;font-size:16px}.stats-summary{margin-top:8px;border-top:1px dashed #fff5ee;font-weight:700}@media (min-width:1150px){.stats__container{padding:20px;margin-bottom:20px}.stats-item{padding:10px 0;font-size:22px}.stats-summary{margin-top:20px}}@media (min-width:700px){.stats{grid-column:1/2}}.aquarium{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;grid-column:1/-1;grid-row:1}.aquarium__bowl{height:300px;width:300px;border-radius:50%;background:#0ff;position:relative;overflow:hidden;z-index:-1}.aquarium__bowl:after,.aquarium__bowl:before{position:absolute;content:"";background:#0e3434;height:40px;width:100%;left:0;bottom:-20px;z-index:10}.aquarium__bowl:before{left:0;bottom:calc(100% - 40px)}@media (min-width:700px){.aquarium{grid-column:2/4}}@media (min-width:1150px){.aquarium__bowl{height:500px;width:500px}}header{padding:10px 20px}header h1{text-transform:uppercase;text-align:center;letter-spacing:6px;margin:0;font-size:30px}@media (min-width:1150px){header h1{font-size:70px}}.fish{height:35px;width:35px;position:absolute;animation:floatingY 2s ease-in-out infinite alternate;background-position:50%;background-size:cover}.fish:nth-child(4n+1){animation-duration:2.1s}.fish:nth-child(4n+2){animation-duration:3.3s}.fish:nth-child(4n+3){animation-duration:4.5s}.fish--neonka{background-image:url(a52d9987dba4f6c42ba3a6e27b9b132a.png)}.fish--gupik{background-image:url(be2bf830abeb5dc86c17f167c93af8f4.png)}.fish--skalar{background-image:url(d1a9934531662f136423ed45be664a27.png)}@keyframes floatingY{0%{transform:translateY(-100%)}to{transform:translateY(100%)}}
